scripts.lint: npm run organizeImports && npm run format
scripts.start: npx tsc && npm run copy && npx parcel src/videoFilterDemo/videoFilterDemo.html
scripts.build: npm run clean  && npm run lint && npx tsc && npm run copy && export NODE_ENV=production && node --max-old-space-size=5000 node_modules/parcel/bin/cli.js build src/videoFilterDemo/videoFilterDemo.html -d docs --no-content-hash --detailed-report --no-source-maps --public-url './' && cp node_modules/mirada/dist/src/opencv.js docs && rm -rf ../../../demos/docs/ojos-demo && mkdir -p ../../../demos/docs/ojos-demo &&  mv docs/* ../../../demos/docs/ojos-demo/
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build
